00036                             Delete, DeleteFile, DeleteEntry,

00046 class Song
00047 {
00048 public:

00059     bool checkTags();

00069 
00070     QString displayName() { return this->artist+" - "+this->title; }
00071     QString location() { return this->path+"/"+this->filename; }

00074    * (Should) Take care of special characters not allowed in filenames.

00090     QString title;
00091     QString album;

00093     int trackNr;                                                        // trackNr on CD
00094     int year;                                                               // year of song
00095     int bitrate;                                                        // bitrate in kbps
00096     // file and mp3-layer info

00098     QString path;                                                       // path to file, excluding filename, no trailing slash
00099     unsigned long filesize;                                 // filesize in bytes
00100     int length;                                                         // length of song in seconds
00101     
00102     // additional database info
00103     MyDateTime addedTo;                                         // when song was added to my database
00104     MyDateTime lastPlayed;                                  // last time song was played
00105     int noPlayed;                                                       // how often song was played since added
